alwayes infinitely loved aſſiſtance never wanting without ayd could ſo eaſily endured thoſe labour paſſed thorow wherefore endevour recompence imparting certayne ſecrets yet come knowledge know little alcanders courage bad diſpoſition gave many thanks favour viſiting ſeemed great moſt true ſayd alquif would never thought could outgone u knowledge ſecrets magicke comming hither hath freed u error iſland indiviſible world ſo eaſily diſcovered ſelves alſo maner bereft judgement beholding cannot doubt knowledge farre beyond wherefore without maner diſtruſt wee doe withall acknowledgement accept honour company offer make acquainting u ſuch ſecrets beene hitherto concealed u teſtifie unto ſpeake ingenuouſly freely proteſt henceforth depend wholly upon ſo wee doe heereafter undertake thing ſhall bee advice weake indevours may uſe greatneſſe intention joine without expecting part glory action ſhall redound ſervants let u goe pleaſe wee carry u ſhall bee requiſite thinke good leave nothing behinde u iſland anſwered alcander ſhall need beſt bookes ſufficient vrganda made bundle went chariot griffon ſay alquif vrganda zirza zirenna alquifa yong caſſandra afterwards ayde alcander became ſo perfect art ſhe much excelled parent beaſts load began cut ayre incredible ſwiftneſſe little time arrived caſtle treaſure appeared theſe magician ſo magnificent never ſeene building equal ſoone come thither alcander loſe time deſired put clothes made goe thoſe pretious bath hee formerly prepared reſtore prince greece moſt flouriſhing eſtate age hee kept eyght dayes wrinkle covered face cleane defaced limbes enfeebled troubleſome old age became firme backes bending weight yeeres ſtraightned hayre whited time changed colour briefe found themſelves wholly altered unknowne iſland behold ſayd great prince philoſophers firſt favour doe ſeemes meane importance becauſe wee aſſembled heere onely ſelves let u take little paynes ſee wee may hinder miſchiefe yet fall upon houſe greece loſſe ſome certayne yong prince one day ſtrongeſt pillar chriſtendome propound unto though thinke unprofitable ordinance heaven inevitable howbeit labour ſhall bee without fruit though wee cannot keepe impriſonment yet ſhall wee doe ſomewhat helpe preſerve among enemy ſayd began make conjuration apart altogether unuſefull ſhall know ſequel diſcourſe done alcander thought good returne friend iſland diſcovering enchantment prince greece deſired watch till done benefit chriſtendome hee went away carrying caſſandra along ſhew ſecrets magicke render perfect art chap iv adventure greeke prince returning empire floriſel niquea approoving wiſe alcanders advice wholly deſiſt purpoſe ravaging eſtate pagan thereby render revenge memorable reſolved break day depart greece ordering alaſtraxerea goe unto trebiſond rogell perſia spheramond empire parthia lucendus france dorigell fortunate iſlands king gadart iſland megera anaxander florador melindo olidor ginoldan amanio daſtre kingdomes reſt whither fortune called fearing leſt ſome new warre might breake foorth departure left moiety troopes thoſe whoſe province ſurrounded pagan eſtates might ſurpriſed new garboyle alſo might preſerve countreys gotten matter thus diſpoſed attended next riſing sunne preſented leſſe wonder day done vaſt ſtately edifice wherein thoſe king prince emperours encloſed appeared thing ſeene place thereof onely playne ground battell ſecond loſſe afflicted receyved meane conſolation ſeeing parent interred ſo much glory ſtraightway conſidered ſome new device magician written unto whit diſmayed taking good teſtimony love left thoſe body middeſt ſo many enemy prepared departure leſſe griefe time remoove come thoſe troopes began march ſeverall wayes spheramond dorigell sylvan amanio daſtre fayre fayre licinia whoſe death heard spheramond amanio daſtre dorigell lamented ſo great diſaſter although glorious death kinſmen yeeld ſome comfort thus paſſed two three dayes without meeting adventure niquea followed two cenophales armond bohemia alteria malford leonida • ladazan numidia infantery onely five twenty thouſand men remained guard towne camp charge garmant sinaldo gucilador ſhore thus followed thruſts ſhields ſo hewed little left upon arm helmet battered cuiraſſes pierced graſſe ſtained bloud often knight savage advanced ſword grew pale lifting mine eye heaven implored aid god knight many time riſing part inſtantly fell fear weakneſſe briefly beheld combat dead alive six howrs ſpent faſhion yet advantage diſcerned either ſide quitted ſwords taking one another middle fell wreſtling together extream fury ſometimes one ſometimes another ſo toiled thus incredible deſpight ſee victory advanced mutuall conſent aroſe taking ſwords againe renewed combat crueller fearfull manner griolanis part height well declared one prime knight world savage nothing behinde continued fight ſort three foure houres longer advanced ſwords one ſame inſtant diſcharged ſuch violence griolanis able ſupport weight blow fell ground quite deprived ſenſe juſt enemy ſtaggering like fall theſe two knight ſo amazed able go preſently griolanis▪ love prevailing feare laſt aroſe unlace savage aſſailed one another furiouſly one bowed crupper horſe hit chin againſt breaſt griolanis aſtoniſhed valiant aethiopian oftentimes compelled loſe ſtirrups ſtagger weight blow lucibel drew bloud enemy little ſtrong battell could beene concluded honour parted one howbeit reſolved attend next morning ſee unto fortune would give victory fowr firſt combatant went lie together certain tree ſaw giant paſſe along carrying torch one hand held fair damſell wept bitterly cry help unto god ſeemed rozalmond beautious armazia put ſuch rage inſtantly got horſe galloping giant threatned million death yong ſhepheard received courteouſly forgot affair betook reſt whilſt others clean contrary viſions ſtraied one another ſeverall way chap ix marvel griolanis encounter purſuing fantoſmes alcander valiant knight savage griolanis extream deſire overtake two centaur ſeemed carry away certain damſels rode ſo hard break day found themſelves cloſe great ſpacious forreſt entrance wherof perceiving two way alike beaten ſeparated themſelves though ſomewhat unwillingly grian taking right hand griolanis left purſuing courſe ſame deſire ſuccor theſe afflicted woman thought hand thoſe monſters delightfull unto compoſed much fear ſhall eaſily meet ſeek let u follow fortune ſaid alcidas love never wanting adore paſt river came certain ſallows gave pleaſant ſhade end one thoſe meadow alcidas alighting ſaid unto clariſel sir hold fit ſhould ſtay heer ſee miralinda paſſe commonly ſhe go way graz flock upon freſh paſture think good anſwered clariſel ſo little ſelf able ſay thing purpoſe wherupon alighted took horſe bridle alcidas done letting feed amongſt tree returned cloſe high way eſpied yong ſhepherd folding arm acroſſe lifting eies heaven ſaid heaven long ſuffer object ſcorn ſhepherdeſſe render ſenſible affection willingly forſaken ambition might make men deſire put habit unworthy eſtate ſo might enjoy ſight leſſe ſuſpition ſerve ſame reſpects ſhould uſed perſon eminent yet ſhe forbids preſence ſhuns permit ſo much ſay die extream ingratitude complain thus without great deal reaſon live ſaid clariſel ſhall never jealous ſhepherd ſuffer find better entertainment cauſe monſter rendered almoſt inhabitable imagining ſiſter would never permit undertake voiage becauſe ſhe would let go ſight ſhe another minde purpoſed ſome wile meeting either long impatience deſires difficult good ſucceſſe ſhe could hope hazardous endanger ſhe could draw reſolution ſuch contrariety thought length affection undertake nothing ſhe concluded quit iſland ſee ſiſters colour going knight commanded look well unto would anſwer perill head perceiving emperour come himſelf chyrurgeons aſſured danger hurt ran preſently chamber cauſed himſelf armed ſpeed mounting horſe gallopped away towards wood firſt arivall heard certain cry made put himſelf amongſt thickeſt tree one ſaw ceſarina tied beautifull miſtris hand two giant pulling armour raviſh ſight poſſeſſing ſtrange fury alighted ſword drawn approached theſe two coloſſes finding head greateſt unarmed divided two thinking obliged uſe curteſie perſons capable grown wiſer companion misfortune laced helmet cryed stand caitiff may revenge death man thou haſt baſely ſurpriſed let one blow reward thy wickedneſſe saying ſo diſcharged curtleax ſuch violence ſtund knight arm making recoil pace two back wrath increaſing conſidering ſafety lady ſtake laid head ſuch tempeſt albeit ſword turned hand ſtruck flat yet ſent dead ground brain flying horrible violence blow done came ſpeedily traſiclea cutting cord wherewithall ſhe tied ſaid god inhumanity inchain able captivate world madam theſe barbarous villain ignorant valour therefore fear ſword made ſecure themſelves binding trick uſe reduce thereunto ſurpriſed muſe ſaid ſhe two mighty blow laid along remaining without motion could hinder binding even came theſe villain unarming threatned make ſerve ſatisfying brutiſh luſt thanks god freed valour yet wonder could leave emperour arrive ſo luckily ſaid leave emperour wee ſeen ſtrange thing within theſe two howrs recounted unto paſſed tarſipolis whereat ſhe remained ſo much amazed contented ſhe could never commend good fortune enough made miſtreſſe ſo brave valiant knight let u go dear friend ſaid ſhe unto let u go releaſe emperour care loſſe let u think upon pain wherewithall may ſufficiently puniſh wicked creature ſo cunningly betrayed u fitter think endure anſwered juſt fair would leave care execution officer empire undertake noble reſolution give ſome ſpeedy end ſufferings nevertheleſſe ſeeing commanded • ilent herein proceed refer performance promiſe gracious pleaſure ſee ſaid ſhe time begets occaſion content day done thing able oblige father deny ſo much deſire yes knight patient ſhall quickly ſee ſelf reſt let complaint diminiſh obligation ſuccour let feel contentment without grief whereupon ceſarina untied took way citie wherein met five ſix troop knight emperour ſent deliverance traſiclea ſeeing return valiant ſtranger ſo alcidamant ordinarily termed underſtanding matter paſt raiſed praiſes ſuch height aſhamed traſiclea moſt contented earth ſpeed made ſoon brought citie traſiclea went ſtraight ſee father taking hand fell weeping extream joy ſee thee dear child ſaid hope mine ſafety thy life ah much bound god ſo great grace owe brave ſtranger hath day done ſuch wonder never ſhee diſcourſe ſaid amplimira hath poſſeſt mee great deſire ſee pleaſed sir grant u contentment willingly anſwered would acquainted uſe reſpect perſwaded ſhee deſerves carriage aſſures ſhe nobly derived herewith amadis called forth came chamber ſtrangely perplexed hee reſolved himſelf moved ſoone hee appeared hall fallen knee miſtreſſe exceedingly taken ſight ſuch comely perſon hee found himſelf ſo loſt hee able utter word howbeit ſhee beheld particular good ſhee could call love leſſe raviſhed hee deſiring confirm ſaid unto fair ſtranger ayl let u know whence came madam anſwered unhappy ſhe applauds fortune vvhich hath brought hither enjoy bleſſedneſſe preſence ariſe ſvveet heart ſaid palmire •• ſhall ſee vve ſhall ſo cheriſh careſſe ſhall cauſe complain saying ſo ſhee miſtreſſe tarſander prince balivana nephew emperour ſighed often foot howbeit ſo diſcreetly emperour notwithſtanding old yeeres extreamly paſſionate could never perceive every one adored hee ſhewed cauſe intreat ſhe obey moſt willingly ſaid name amadis ſonne great emperour greece trebiſond moſt unhappy knight breathing ſuch powerto helpe take ſome compaſſion caſe dear creſtia paſſe little merit returned againſt enemy vexed ſee ſtil ſaddles incounterd ſo rudely conſtrained fly crupper horſes extreem diſcontent duke corzan advancing companion received ſame diſgrace former firſt courſe theſe corpulencie rodamans arbalion oppoſed two gyants leſs dreadfull great perſwading courſe would worth ſight leaned together cloſe emperour long ſaw thoſe furious warriours ſet forth meeting middeſt courſe broke alike without ſo much moving ſaddles life ſaid emperour one braveſt incounters ever beheld queſtionleſs lorgades hath juſtly acquired name good knight ſince able withſtand rifantes let u ſee wil enſue two knight taken freſh launce ſpurred away followed companion carryed maſts ſhips broke extream furie lorgades loſing ſtirrops danger falling caught hold horſes mane rifantes paſſed gallantly though ſomewhat aſtoniſhed arbalion rodamans overturned upon horſe crupper brundamor king alfanar little violence ſhock aſſiſtants remained amazed ſo furious incounter exceedingly deſired hit ſo rudely helmet made reele three foure pace back whereupon perceiving knight run horſe belly halbard quit ſaddle inſtantly flying amongſt covered ground three foure gyants come themſelves returning incredible furie began charge ſuch terrible blow many time conſtrained bow knee nevertheleſs fought ſo couragiouſly ſo often drew bloud little cauſe brag advantage reſolved either vanquiſh dye one took scimitar hand diſplaying force ſtrook ſo mainly head wiſely avoyded blow queſtionleſs death howbeit leaping lightly aſide let fall upon ground whereinto entred hilt taking hold opportunitie whilſt gyant drawing diſcharged sword ſo dangerouſly caſque cleft brain overthrowing noyſe like tower whoſe foundation ſay • e one arme little bloud left thinking companion ſtrucken lightning would fain ſaved himſelf flight ſo weak firſt ſtep fel breathing laſt warriour ſeeing himſelf freed theſe coloſſes exceedingly troubled going ſet upon reſt perceived lady comming marvellous beautifull followed two twentie knight richly armed gyant far greater former addreſſing ſpeech unto ſaid knight perſiſt combat put yourſelf hand love life know well valour make confident ſlaughter behold may perſwade couragiouſly paſſe danger whatſoever able oppreſſe ſo multitude muſt need fall laſt beſides guard place eſtabliſhed ſurprize knight though ſo tall yet way inferiour valour ſtrength ſheath sword follow aſſurance ſhall receive diſpleaſure madam anſwered much amazed behold ſo rare beautie wil gladly ſubmit ſelf power ſo ſweet captivitie moſt pleaſing would ſpent bloud armour met nuptials theſe lord dinner done thouſand knight ready within barrier prince went armed themſelves little appeared place like ſo many god battail marquis beltamir admirall corolandaya placed iudges ſcaffolds trumpet ſounding part thoſe two troop wherein glory knighthood world aſſembled began ſet forth thoſe two invincible champion alcidamant rozalmond charging launce one againſt another incountred ſuch fury earth even trembled horſes foot ſtaves broken thouſand ſhivers yet ſo much moved ſaddles paſſed along like two rock ſtanding firm againſt violence enraged floud amadis grians courſe performed much grace force griolanis clariſel ran againſt like fortune equall honour traſiclea floridan betwixt brandimanda lucibel grinaldo unhorſed gentle rusſian medium armorand seſtilian overthrown earth ſo criſander valiant florisbel falemond diſmounted againſt addreſſed launce meantime two troop incountred two hundred knight layd ground withdrawing aſide fear trampled horſes foot began almoſt pleaſant bickering alcidamant rozalmond put confuſion ſwords fell like thunderbolt wherſoever lighted amadis overturned met withall grian left knight ſaddle clariſel flew like lightning griolanis ſeemed fury floridan lucibel rusſian florisbel wonder went traſiclea brandimanda armorand grinaldo horſed made leſſe havock briefly victory hung equally ballanced every upon ſole force chieftain depended content turnament rozalmond jealous alcidamants glory amadis grians clariſel envying honour griolanis acquired went aſſayled one time began one braveſt combat ever ſeen amongſt ſix touch cloud ſight theſe colloſſes poſſeſſing new reſolution troups rallyed together whilſt thoſe eleven couragious prince accompanied traſiclea brandimanda got ſuddenly ſharp launce placed themſelves little dwarf marched chariot wherin rozalmond knew caſſandra moſt beautifull penamonda greece siſter deareſt friend ſaid addreſſing ſpeach caſſandra much joyed ſight come thus accompanyed ſiſter lord anſwered ſhe doe bring without good cauſe ſhe come congratulate good fortune go along ſevennight hence adventure great importance ſhe moſt heartily welcome replyed rozalmond glad ſhe keep armazia caliph siconia ſolicited idalcan emperour melly aſſembles paganiſme reſolution take make warre upon prince greace generall muſter army men generous nothing ſo tender honour cannot endure ſhould way ſon silves de la silva hath related five thirtieth chapter firſt part reſolved employ friend arm world rather want revenge ſo outragious affront effect diſpatched away courriers diver part ſoon arrived empire deſiring king prince adjoyning countrey repair unto falanzar great emperour caliph siconia neere kinſman deliberate certain affair much importing glory paganiſm theſe diſpatches made commanded captaines come unto delivered commiſſions rayſing arming threeſcore thouſand men departing inſtantly therupon went siconia rage furniſhing reaſons able perſwade much ſo incenſed falanzar againſt chriſtians reſolved ſet reſt quarrell revenge kinſman coſt pagan bethinking thoſe might beſt ſerve enterprize ſent away meſſengers furious king grifalara brufaldar king gedroſia valourous palamedes king caſſandria briefly prince could hope aſſiſtance ſuch ſort end two moneths perſon court together king mauritania tremizen zamphara zambar cartagena aganezes angali numidia biſaura thunes teneri miramolin iſle till tragonites zanfara calizan morlavia nazamor siziphala tingafort barnagas monomatapan arginare cornata came requeſt emperour melly hundred thirteen king emperours caliph soldans soveraigne prince whoſe valour great wonder expected theſe great lord falanzar aſſembled ſtately ſpations hall cauſed ſo many throne erected perceiving ſilence ſpake manner oration falanzar emperour siconia pagan potentate mighty prince troubled ſo far aſſemble repreſent two thing unto great conſequence u glory altar much abated inſolence certain petty prince greece little reſentment outrage thouſand time received therupon time think u rouze ſelves appeare zealous ſervice god ſenſible leſſe daunted ſome paſſed loſſes fallen upon u indiſcreet managing deſignes neglect taking hold occaſion hath fairly preſented unto u wee ſuffered grow great mock u nay worſe ſo vain threaten come ſhare crown u pleaſure put u ſword force people acknowledge dominion render earth ſubject command vanity inſupportable beare ſhall endure come ſeek u houſes deprive u wife land liberty verely amazes paganiſme repleniſhed mighty emperours callphs soldans prince excellent knight man would never yet ſpeak overrunning theſe inſolents leaving ſo much foot ground upon might tread maſters mine part reſolved exhauſt treaſures put ſubjects arm leave ſouldier empire couſin melly hath far cauſe complain grian salvage made travell ſix houres incredible payn met together comming athicket exceedingly vext could learn news loſſe made hereupon reſted themſelves little took firſt way preſented ſelfe unto went ſo long till encountred certain high wals fight whereof wonderfull glad hoping hear ſomewhat ſought walked halfe houre perceived two damoſels upon battlement wals unto griolanis addreſſing himſelfe ſpake ſort gentlewoman courteous faire tell u whether ſaw lady forceably carried away u laſt night foreſt hereby knight anſwered one could ſoon let ſee aske garden way come hither ſo difficult ſhall able obtayn contentment prime knight earth gentlewoman ſaid grain vanity u perſwaded thoſe beſt world thus much promiſe wil courage undertake knight may performe come though ſhould paſſe hel wherfore deſire wil pleaſed ſhew u way know ſaid damoſel whether action anſwerable word give cauſe adventure ſelves look ſaid ſhe ſhewing penamonda greece gentle adelazia one cranies tyed cord theſe think thoſe ſeek ſhall continue eſtate untill free bond ſave greater puniſhment ſuffer valour wanting preſent ſaid king corolandaya equally ſeized joy griefe ſhall want courage ſuch enterpriſe aſſured gentlewoman chopt thouſand peeces rather fayle need onely doe tell u may get gate faid damoſel ſhall find hundred pace hence ſame ſhall ſhew two wayes let take fortune ſhall direct without returning conſideration ſoever upon theſe two valiant champion advancing forward met gate damoſel ſpoke couragiouſly entring diſcryed two little pathes right griolanis took grian salvage left lead cave number lighted torch hanging top roofe plainly diſcovered ground unto ſo covered poynts ſwords pike halbards partizan ſtanding upright impoſſible make ſtep without treading ſharpe ſteel ſomewhat troubled firſt nevertheleſſe aſhamed make ſtop difficulty ſo charged contrary damoſel ſtoopſt pull beſt meane paſſe along juſt hee took hold halberd ſprung earth hit ſuch violence breſt turned withall much incenſed aroſe ſet foot voyd place halberd ſtood feixing hand poynt ſword felt himſelfe hit ſo great force overthrown ſtood ſtifly room enough place foot going doe begun mighty noyſe ſuddenly riſing beheld thoſe poynts come ground torch inſtant exringuiſhed without ſeeing body felt himſelfe charged ſuch tempeſt long quarter hour knee inforced bow infirmity heavie blow layd upon ſhield ſhoulders head chooſing death rather faile enterpriſe aroſe rage began cut thoſe pike partizan halberd ſwords aſunder little little gayning ground ſometimes flung blade furiouſly head gave downright croſſe blow briefly skirmiſhed manner thouſand knight head againſt dangerous combat continued two hour ſo much paine labour knight leſſe ſtrong valiant could endured hee met certain ſteps upon firſt whereof ſet foot ſo terrible charge ceaſed gave leave fit ſecond ſtep ſo much breath faine lift viſier helmet take ayr griolanis leſſe perplexed likewiſe came cave full lighted torch
